name: Canvas Component Export GIF

movements.name: Export GIF

beats.title: Rasterize SVG and Encode GIF
beats.userStory: As an engineer, I need `exportSvgToGif` to rasterize frames and encode GIF with telemetry.
beats.testCase: success minimal export triggers download without error

then: GIF exports with expected frames and palette; progress reported

movements.userStory: As a platform operator, I need GIF export to render frames and encode deterministically within ≤2s P95.
movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable KPIs; ensures consistent service delivery with SLA compliance (target: 99.9%)
